title: Was a Tiny Chameleon with Huge Genitals Discovered in Madagascar?
subtitle: A newly discovered, miniature chameleon may be the world's smallest adult male reptile. Evolutionarily speaking, not everything appears to have shrunk at the same rate, however.
author: Alex Kasprak
vclaim: A newly discovered chameleon species in Madagascar may include the smallest mature male reptiles known to science, but they have disproportionately large genitalia.
